alert.note: Alert for Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 16 at 3:30PM HST until February 17 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .A west-northwest swell has been subsiding but will continue to generate large breaking waves along most north and west facing shores of the island chain through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 14 to 18 feet along north facing shores of Molokai and Maui, and 12 to 16 feet along west facing shores of Molokai. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials, and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala
